00004 void FSMMachine::UpdateMachine(int t)
00005 {
00006         if(m_states.size() == 0)
00007                 return;
00008 
00009         if(!m_currentState)
00010                 m_currentState = m_defaultState;
00011         if(!m_currentState)
00012                 return;
00013 
00014         //update current state and check for transition
00015         int oldStateId = m_currentState->m_type;
00016         m_goalId = m_currentState->CheckTransitions(t);
00017 
00018         //change states if there was a transition
00019         if(m_goalId != oldStateId)
00020         {
00021                 if(TransitionState(m_goalId))
00022                 {
00023                         m_currentState->Exit();
00024                         m_currentState = m_goalState;
00025                         m_currentState->Enter();
00026                 }
00027         }
00028         m_currentState->Update(t);
00029 }
